conbody.p: The subtraction definition is taking away a number or amount from another number or amount. It is the inverse operation of addition. While addition adds or puts together numbers to find the sum, subtraction removes a number from another number to find the difference. The subtract meaning can also be to compare two values to see how many make a value different from another number. That's the most basic idea of why the answer to a subtraction problem is called the difference.
